title: Microsoft woos Mac owners with $300 Windows 10 'Trade Up' promotion
text:
Microsoft woos Mac owners with $300 Windows 10 'Trade Up' promotion 
Published By: AppleInsider.com - Today 
Microsoft on Thursday debuted a limited-time, in-store incentive program offering customers in the market for a new (non-Surface) computer r...
